channel.title: Introduction :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Previously, we learned how we can use lists in Python to store multiple values, or elements, in a single variable. Each element in a list is given an index, which allows us to uniquely reference and identify each elementâ€™s position in a list. Python lists use consecutive integers starting at $ 0 $ as indexes, which makes for a pretty easy to use data structure.
